alert.note: Alert for St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 27 at 5:45AM AKDT until March 29 at 6:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TUESDAY TO 6 AM AKDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow with low visibility expected. Total snow accumulations of two inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. Visibility one half mile or less at times. * WHERE...St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast. * WHEN...From 10 AM Tuesday to 6 AM AKDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Snow drifts will form.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast
